body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

`binutils@2.36.1 %oneapi@2022.0.0` build is failing using:
* `spack@develop` (e86cdbbf2302e46907c09984a482c8fe4e5c1f7b from `Thu Mar 3 19:53:40 2022 -0800`)
* Ubuntu 20.04, X86_64 (AMD EPYC 7662 64-Core Processor)
* OneAPI Toolkit 2022.1.2.146 installed using offline Intel installer
* Seeing the same issue with `binutils@2.38 %oneapi`

Concrete spec: [binutils.spec.json.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8199526/binutils.spec.json.txt)

Concretization:
```
binutils@2.36.1%oneapi@2022.0.0~gas+gold+headers~interwork+ld+libiberty~lto~nls+plugins libs=shared,static patches=a51b7bf arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64
    ^diffutils@3.8%oneapi@2022.0.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64
        ^libiconv@1.16%oneapi@2022.0.0 libs=shared,static arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64
    ^zlib@1.2.11%oneapi@2022.0.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64
```

Compiler entry for `oneapi@2022.0.0`:
```
compilers:
- compiler:
    spec: oneapi@2022.0.0
    paths:
      cc: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2022.0.2/linux/bin/icx
      cxx: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2022.0.2/linux/bin/icpx
      f77: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2022.0.2/linux/bin/ifx
      fc: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2022.0.2/linux/bin/ifx
    flags: {}
    operating_system: ubuntu20.04
    target: x86_64
    modules:
    - compiler/2022.0.2
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths:
    - /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2022.0.2/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin
```

To reproduce:
```
$> spack install -f ./binutils.spec.json
...
==> Installing binutils-2.36.1-bs5sf7kl6awtw3tiq5eivawn2ehd4fdt
==> No binary for binutils-2.36.1-bs5sf7kl6awtw3tiq5eivawn2ehd4fdt found: installing from source
==> Warning: microarchitecture specific optimizations are not supported yet on mixed compiler toolchains [check oneapi@2022.0.0 for further details]
==> Fetching https://mirror.spack.io/_source-cache/archive/5b/5b4bd2e79e30ce8db0abd76dd2c2eae14a94ce212cfc59d3c37d23e24bc6d7a3.tar.bz2
==> Applied patch /spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/binutils/parallel-build-2.36.patch
==> binutils: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> binutils: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> binutils: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16' 'V=1'

28 errors found in build log:
```
